serviceOne.title: Customizable
serviceOne.desc: Create and modify rubrics easily, ensuring a custom tailored solution to specific needs across different industries.

serviceOne.title: Integration
serviceOne.desc: Seamlessly integrate with existing platforms such as LMS, CRM, ATS and more.

serviceOne.desc: Ability to handle various input types like; text, audio & video for broader applicability.

serviceOne.title: Ask anything
serviceOne.desc: Lets users quickly find answers to their questions without having to search through multiple sources.

serviceOne.title: Real-Time Feedback
serviceOne.desc: Instant feedback to facilitate immediate learning and improvement.

serviceOne.title: Scalability
serviceOne.desc: Effortlessly handle large volumes of assessments concurrently.

serviceTwo.title: Reduces cost by upto 70%
serviceTwo.desc: No limitation on API keys you can generate or AI evaluators you can create.

serviceTwo.title: Pay for what you use
serviceTwo.desc: There is no setup fee, annual fees or any monthly subscription. You pay only for usage.

serviceTwo.title: Try before you buy
serviceTwo.desc: No credit card required to try and it is super easy to setup your AI Co-Pilot.
